alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Routt and east central Moffat Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 519 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Craig to 7 miles northwest of Hayden. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hayden. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 98 and 114. Colorado 13 between mile markers 96 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin
